keywords: Slice,Pescatarian,Halal,Seafood free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Coconut Meringue Slice Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C and grease a 18x28cm shallow square tin.
Cream butter and 1/2 cup sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in eggs yolks and mix well.
Mix in flour. Spread over base of pre-prepared tin using lightly floured fingertips.
Beat eggs whites until stiff peaks form. Gradually add remaining sugar. Beat until thick and glossy. Fold in coconut using a metal spoon.
Spread over base. Bake for 25-30 minutes or until cooked when tested with a skewer. Cool before cutting into squares to serve.
